access: The entire condo is yours to enjoy!
description:
Experienced  Super-host offers private spacious & sunny condo 3 miles from Chicago "Loop" Lakefront and Museums. Large one bedroom with king size premium mattress, and sofa-bed comfortably sleeps 4. Fully equipped kitchen and Large multinational food market 3 blocks walk.
FREE PARKING wi-fi , washer & dryer. BUS to city center is across the street. 10 minute ride to city center. Walk to United Center Bulls/Blackhawk games and concerts. THIS IS A NO SMOKING HOME. PLEASE DO NOT BOOK IF YOU SMOKE.

Our goal is to provide a comfy, clean and affordable place to stay while exploring Chicago.( Please be sure to read location information too). 
 Although entirely renovated this classic Chicago Row House Style building is over 100 years old. So you will hear some daily living noise from above. The entire condo is for your private use. Large kitchen, all essentials. King size bed & pull out sofa comfortably fit 4 guests. Game Room for your enjoyment and in unit laundry room for your convenience. Spacious and comfortable. Fully stocked home!
Kitchen has all cooking needs including coffee, coffee pot , cream, sugar, spices pans & dishes. We provide iron hair dryer, laundry, dish and hand soap. Shampoo, conditioner, linens, pillows.
After booking you will have access the " Chicago  House Manuel". This will have  local tips, favorite restaurants, more on how to get around and sightseeing.

The entire condo is yours to enjoy!

Joyce is an experienced superhost & co-host and she  lives just down the street. She will be available for any needs. She has lived her entire life in Chicago and is happy to assist with any travel questions.

We are located in a gentrifying city neighborhood bordering the trendy West Loop area. You can walk a few blocks east to the United Center ( Bulls & Blackhawks games & Concert Venue). There is also a large multinational Fresh Food Market a few minutes walk and typical fast food. Otherwise not much to walk to. But we are just a few miles away from all Chicago has to offer! 
While we do NOT have any trendy cafes  or boutique shops  within  walking distance, WE ARE ACROSS THE STREET FROM THE BUS STOP ( or inexpensive $5-$ 8 Uber ride) to award winning West Loop destination restaurants, bars and shopping. This is a spacious affordable alternative to pricey neighborhoods while being minutes away from all the action. 

If you are ok with not walking directly to Chicago attractions and your travel style allows for a gentrifying city neighborhood this is the space for you!  Also see "Getting Around" section of the listing for more information.

You can  use the "United Center" ( a few blocks east)  in google maps for a location reference. Exact address is provided after booking.

Walk to the United Center in 5 minutes. The #126 Jackson bus stop is across the street. Cost is $2.50 Sometimes it may be better to Uber or Lyft. Less than 10 minute ride to West Loop. 15 minutes to downtown Chicago Loop ( city center) and Michigan Ave the lakefront and museums.

Walk to the Food Market ( also liquor) store. 

FROM AIRPORTS TO THE CONDO 

O'Hare - about 35 minutes.

Follow signs for "trains to city ". Take the BLUE Line train. Get off at the SECOND Western stop. Do NOT get off at the first Western stop.  Walk 4 blocks to the house. There is a map included in the listing pictures. '

Midway - About 35 minutes
Follow signs " trains to city" . Take ORANGE Line train and transfer to the BLUE line - FOREST PARK train. Get off at WESTERN stop. Walk 4 blocks to the house. There is a map included in the listing pictures.

We offer a clean affordable well designed short term home for your stay in Chicago.  We are not in a trendy area - see location description please. However it is very easy ( bus across the street) and inexpensive and quick ride to many Chicago attractions. 
 There is not much to walk to other than fast food and one really great Multinational Fresh Food Market ( also carries alcohol). 
There are people living above you. Everyone needs to be respectful of neighbors. Even though the condo has been renovated you will hear daily living noise as the building is over 100 years old. 
This airbnb is managed by Joyce - a superhost herself and an experienced Co-host. She  hopes all of this information helps you decide if we are a good fit for your travel style!
house_rules:
Quite hours 9pm-9am. Please Please be mindful of neighbhors when playing games. Our neighbors live above and to the side of us. We are all sharing walls and all deserve respect. 
No parties. Only guests on the reservation are permitted in the home. This is a residential neighborhood. If you live in Chicago please message me before instant booking. We also ask that Guests be 21 years old to book and have a current picture on your profile. NO SMOKING ALLOWED INSIDE OR OUTSIDE OF ANYTHING. IF YOU SMOKE PLEASE DO NOT BOOK.

access: You will have full run of the apartment.
description:
Charming one bedroom apartment on the border of Lakeview and Lincoln Park. Tons of natural light and a quiet building. This spot is ideally located by a number of restaurants, bars, and shopping, and is also less than half a mile from Lake Michigan. Enjoy easy access to the beach, parks, and the Lakefront Trail as well as everything else that Chicago has to offer.

The apartment is about 800 square feet and features a bedroom with a full-size bed, a large living room, kitchen, dining room, and bathroom. Wi-Fi and a TV with an Amazon Fire stick are available. Coin operated washer and dryer are available in the basement. The kitchen does not have a dishwasher, but does have a small drying rack for dishes.

You will have full run of the apartment.

I will not be in the apartment during your stay, but do live there full time. 

I will be available by phone and/or email throughout your stay for any issues that may arise, or if you have questions about the best spot to grab brunch. The keys to the apartment will be in a lock box at the front of the building.

This apartment is in the heart of to everything. Public transportation is incredibly close and easy to use, making your trip to Chicago that much easier. With the lake less than half a mile from the front door and Lincoln Park mere blocks away, the surrounding area couldn't be more beautiful. There are tons of bars and restaurants within walking distance that offer a range of dining experiences, from sushi to steak, coffee, beer, and more. 

The Lincoln Park Zoo is about a mile walk away. This free zoo hosts a range of animals and activities, and is right next to South Pond which has beautiful trails on which to walk and enjoy some nature in the city. Additionally, the botanical garden is right next to the zoo. Mon Ami Gabi, a restaurant of the Lettuce Entertain You Enterprises, is right across the way and definitely worth a stop.

Grab a Divy bike and head down along the Lakefront Trail to Navy Pier, the Michigan Mile, Museum Campus, the Bean, and more. This paved trail cuts right along the lake.

.2 miles from 143 & 151 & 146 & 137 bus lines
.1 miles from 22 &36 bus lines
.6 miles from the Brown Line (connects to the Red Line one stop away for no transfer fee)

There is free street parking available around the apartment but it may be difficult to find a spot. There is also a garage directly behind the building that has parking available for a fee. 

If you like to walk or run, there's no better place to do so than on the Lakefront Trail. This running/walking/biking trail spans for 18 miles and gives you not only some beautiful views of the city itself, but also some of the best sights the city has to offer.

access:
The second floor rear deck is for your exclusive use. The house is on a double lot, with the back and side yard also available for your use.  A free washer and dryer for your exclusive use is available in a private basement space.  

The dedicated parking pad off the alley is visible from the rear deck.
description:
Large 3 bedroom 1 bath apartment in a historic Sheridan Park 2 flat  - Andersonville, Wrigley all minutes away and surrounded by food, music, and nightlife.  8 min walk to the new Wilson CTA Station.  surrounded by nightlife, restaurants, shops, and music venues.  Private parking space included.

This 2nd floor apartment has 3 large bedrooms and 1 bathroom, gorgeous vintage millwork, huge windows, and 10’ tall ceilings.  Central air conditioning, eat in kitchen, large dining room, private deck, private washer and dryer (downstairs) and a dedicated parking space included.

The second floor rear deck is for your exclusive use. The house is on a double lot, with the back and side yard also available for your use.  A free washer and dryer for your exclusive use is available in a private basement space.  

The dedicated parking pad off the alley is visible from the rear deck.

I live in the building and available if you need anything.

Located on a quiet tree lined oasis surrounded by things to do and ways to get there!  Walking distance to great restaurants in Uptown, Andersonville and Lincoln Square. Wrigley Field, The Metro, Green Mill, Riviera, Aragon Ballroom, The Batton, Carol's Pub, Target and multiple grocery stores are all walking distance. Just blocks from the Red and Purple CTA lines as well as the Metra train. There's a private dedicated parking space in back of the property.

With a walk score of 94, it’s easiest to leave your car on the parking pad!   The brand new Wilson Red line station is just a few blocks east.

description:
1 bedroom coach house apartment located in West Town.  Two miles from downtown.  10 minute walk to Blue Line train.  Half a mile away from Union Park, lots of festivals and fests.  In this hot area you are minutes from the action.

One bedroom coach house apartment.  Apartment has been completely redone with new floors, fresh paint, brand new Couches, Bed and TV.  One queen bed and one air mattress.

You can reach me anytime with questions via phone or email.

Friendly and festive neighborhood.   Extremely popular area and close to all the action.

There is a bus stop a block away.  The Blue Line train is a mile walk.  There is FREE street parking that does NOT require a permit.

access: You will be provided a key to your apartment upon arrival.  Upon confirmation, when you arrive, I will provide you with a key to the location that will be available after 5 p.m. check-in.  However, you may be able to arrive earlier to drop off your luggage.  Your studio WILL NOT be ready until 5 p.m.  You will be provided another space to place your belongings/rest.  Photos of this 'waiting' room is not provided.
description:
This AD is for a PRIVATE Studio Apartment one block from Lake Michigan!  The apartment contains two beds, private bath and kitchenette!  Its the perfect location for golfers and students alike!  The South Shore Country Club Full Golf Coarse is located right across the street as well as the Beach and Lake front!  Public transportation at the corner!

The entire studio apartment is yours and equipped with a two beds (1 queen & 1 twin) and an additional folding cott may be provided if you are a party of 3.   If your group need additional space for a larger group, please let me know.  I do have other rooms as well. The apartment also contains a full closet, private bathroom and private kitchenette.  Your kitchen will be equipped with utensils, dishes, microwave and more.  I provide linen, blankets and pillows.

There is a laundromat right at the corner of the building...a two minute walk.

You will be provided a key to your apartment upon arrival.  Upon confirmation, when you arrive, I will provide you with a key to the location that will be available after 5 p.m. check-in.  However, you may be able to arrive earlier to drop off your luggage.  Your studio WILL NOT be ready until 5 p.m.  You will be provided another space to place your belongings/rest.  Photos of this 'waiting' room is not provided.

You MUST contact me 24 hours before your arrival to let me know what time you wish to come if earlier than 5 p.m.

For reservations longer than 7 days, I require a housekeeping inspection weekly.

This area is known as South Shore.  Its a beautiful area surrounded by the South Shore Cultural and Golf Coarse, Lakefront and beaches, restaurants and public transportation.  Its ideal for those who are attending the University of Chicago or Residents/Interns for Jackson Park Hospital.  Its located minutes from Hyde Park, museums and more.

There is a laundry matt, cleaners and carry out foods next door including beach, golf, divvy bikes rental

NEARBY TRANSIT LOCATION:

You wont have to go far!  The apartment is located ON a bus line.  Directly across the street you have several options as well.

CHICAGO TRANSIT AUTHORITY (CTA): 

The #26 express bus will take you directly downtown in 20 minutes; The #6 bus will take you thru Hyde Park, Science & Industry Museum and last stop...downtown.  CTA Pass price:  $2.50 per ride; $10 (unlimited Day pass); $20 (3-day); $28 (week) and $100 Monthly rate.

METRA:

The metra train is also directly across the street and will take you downtown in 20 minutes or towards University Park. 
Rates:  $8 Weekend Pass, good for unlimited rides on Saturday and Sunday; One way $3.50; 10-Ride $31; Monthly $95.25

DISTANCE TO CITY CENTER/DOWNTOWN LOOP:

My home is located approximately 7 miles from downtown/loop area.  It is a 30 minute ride to downtown by bus; 20 minutes by car.  I am 5 minutes away from President Obama's Home and the University of Chicago. The Museum of Science and Industry is 10 minutes away by car and Navy Pier is 30 minutes by car.

additional_house_rules:
- Quiet Hours between (11pm-7pm)
- No smoking Indoor (Smoking area on back patio)
- Additional cost for double occupancy (paid during booking) 
-No outside shoes in the house (use socks or slippers)
-Clean up after yourself (i.e. wash your dishes/or use dishwasher after usage, make sure the bathroom, bedroom and kitchen are clean etc...) as to not attract any bugs.
-Give advance notice if you have other guests (friend) visiting 
-Pay for additional overnight guest before guest arrives
-Make sure ALL doors including, bedroom, bathroom, back patio doors are closed at ALL times to prevent cats from going inside or outside.
-Cats are extremely curious but they are not allowed to go into your room 
-Turn off lights when not in use and lock front door when leaving the apartment 
-Please only eat your food (dry or frozen) or any continental breakfast if part of your stay agreement
-Bathroom tissue, paper towels etc. provided for shorter stays. Must purchase if longer than 2 weeks
-Do NOT go into my bedroom unless invited
-Leave house keys in your room and lock front door using the bottom knob when your stay is over
-Be sure to leave room in safe condition before checking out. 
-Be Kind to my 
-Check out is anytime after 3pm (earlier with advance notice)

access: Furnished living and bedroom, Kitchen, backyard. Extremely comfortable queen size bed for a relaxing and enjoyable nights sleep.
description:
Why stay downtown or anywhere else when you can stay in one of Chicago's hottest neighborhood and enjoy all the perks of seeing Chicago like a local. This apartment features a one private bedroom in a shared space located in the heart of Chicago. Huge variety of Restaurants to choose from, walking distance to trendy and hip neighborhoods like Wicker Park, Logan Square, Bucktown, 606 trails and spectacular Humboldt Park. Come see for yourself and enjoy all that Chicago has to offer.

Close to public transportations and less than 15 mins train ride to the city center (downtown) with Lincoln Park/Zoo, and North Ave Beach just a bus ride away. 

Please keep in mind that the apartment is about a 10-15 min walk to the nearest subway/metro (Damen blue line train stop from the airport), but a less than a 2 min walk to the nearest bus stop-that takes you to the subway and other main attractions (bus runs more frequently during the day)

Furnished living and bedroom, Kitchen, backyard. Extremely comfortable queen size bed for a relaxing and enjoyable nights sleep.

Assistance with public transportations, restaurant suggestions etc. upon request.   
The apartment comes with two affectionate, lovely but overly curious attention seeking female cats.

Wicker park, Logan square, Bucktown, 606 trails and Humboldt park.

2 mins walk to bus stop and 10-15 mins walk to train stop

Prices:
Extra people: $10 / night after the first guest

description:
* Also See NOTES in "The Space"  *
Lovely single family house with a large fenced backyard. One nice cozy bedroom on the second floor. Common areas including breakfast room (in basement), kitchen, and laundry room. Has office amenities (Wifi, copier, iron, ...) and washer & dryer.

Quiet and nice southwest suburb.  The exact address is NOT in Oak Park, but south of Oak Park. It is located near Midway Airport, and can easily reach Chicago downtown and west suburbs through Ogden Avenue, and Harlem Avenue (which connect to Cermak, Roosevelt, and I-290). There is also a Metra Station at Harlem Avenue nearby (which is served by PACE 307 bus). Close to a major supermarkets and various stores.

***** NOTES *****
(1) REASONS FOR YOU TO CHOOSE THIS PLACE TO STAY (see below)
(2) The host typically would like to greet the guests in person, occasionally this may not be possible.  In the latter case, please contact the host for the procedure of "Self Check-in".
(3) Each room has its own numeric lock (no charge) and the guest can set his/her own code. The lock is very secure. If you forget the code, the lock must be cut and destroyed.  The cost  for each lock is $11 when it must be destroyed.  Please leave the host your code and do not try to reset the lock (as you are likely to make a mistake and render the lock useless).
(4) Street parking (day and night) is available.

REASONS FOR YOU TO CHOOSE THIS PLACE TO STAY
Guests choose a place to stay based what it serves them the best.  We would like to highlight a few items worth considering and invite you to book this place.
(a) We run a very efficient operation and have a very competitive room rate with high quality rooms and services;
(b) Free parking up to a month can be easily arranged.  Parking can be very very expensive in any larger metropolitan, including downtown Chicago.  Therefore it is much more economical to park here and take the train to downtown Chicago. If you rent a room in or near downtown Chicago, you implicitly or explicitly spend a lot of money just on parking.
(c) The "Occupancy Tax" is about 11% in this village which is much less than 23% or higher (doubled) in Chicago. The occupancy tax is paid by the guests based on the sum of room rate and cleaning fee.  With this tax and parking cost in mind, it is much more economical (and still without losing convenient access to downtown Chicago) to stay in a convenient suburbs rather than in Chicago or downtown Chicago. Since the "Occupancy Tax" is waived if you stay 31 days or longer, you can avoid this tax and save quite a bit of money if you plan your trip ahead and check with the host for room availability.

Just make it a homebase for your Chicago bucket list!

description:
This spacious, sunny North Side apartment on a quaint side street is a chic and convenient home away from home for your Chicago visit.

Two blocks from the Red Line 'L' to the downtown Loop, Wrigley Field, Boystown, Lincoln Park and more. 

15 minute walk or 5 min Uber to the beach and lakefront park/trail.

Little Vietnam restaurants, Uptown music venues, and Andersonville drinking/dining/shopping are all within blocks. Fantastic location!

This apartment is located at the dynamic intersection of Uptown, Andersonville, and Edgewater neighborhoods, adjacent to the Red Line and near the lake. 

Uptown "Little Vietnam"/"New Chinatown" neighborhood is right out the door.
Uptown music venues Green Mill, Aragon, and Riviera are four blocks south.
Andersonville shopping and drinking (Hopleaf, Swedish American Museum, gay and/or dive bars, a dozen other restaurants) is four blocks west.
Edgewater beaches and brunch spots are four blocks north.

This Far North Side neighborhood is a fantastic mix of old and new, longtime residents and transplants, quiet and nightlife, all with easy access to public transportation and the lakefront.

Two blocks from Red Line 'L' (Argyle station)
One block from Broadway bus (36), three blocks from Clark bus (22)
Street parking without permit
1/2 block from parking structure with paid parking through ParqEx app
house_rules:
BYO food and drink (do not eat or drink anything already in the apartment except espresso pods and tea).

Remove shoes upon entry - the city is dirty :-/

Do not play the electric guitar or cello. Playing the keyboard and acoustic guitar is fine.

And finally: This is my actual home and my neighbors are my neighbors, so I have to ask guests to abide by a strict policy of no parties, *no visitors in the apartment beyond those included in the reservation,* and a courteous noise level after 10pm. If this sounds like it might cramp your style and you'd rather find a more turn-up-friendly spot, please cancel the reservation with no hard feelings (I have "flexible" booking, so there is no financial penalty if you cancel at least 24 hours prior).

description:
Enjoy a peaceful stay at this colorful, creative, artsy and relaxing garden unit apartment in the heart of Bridgeport. Located a few blocks away from Bridgeport's best bars and restaurants. 

This unit is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and families (with kids). Street parking is free, and I’m readily available via phone or in person (I live a few minutes away).

This cozy apartment has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. A sofa bed in the living room and an eat-in kitchen that is fully stocked with a stove, fridge, pots and pans, dishes, coffee maker, toaster oven and a microwave. Sheets and towels as well as basic toiletries are provided. The apartment can sleep up to 4 guests.
I am a contractor and remodeled the entire unit myself and put a lot of care into creating a space that feels good to walk into.

Guests have full run of the apartment. Additionally, you'll have access to the beautiful roof top deck with plenty of seating, gas grill, access to wi-fi internet as well as the laundry room in the building ($2 per load), detergent is provided. Free street parking available.

Host is available to give keys and any information for your stay upon arrival.

I own the building and live a few minutes away, and will be available by phone, email or in person. If you have any questions about the area or things to do in Chicago. I’m more than happy to help. 
You’ll love it because of the coziness and the proximity to downtown

Located in a few blocks from Bridgeport's best bars and restaurants!

additional_house_rules:
- You agree to the following:
- 
- CHECK-IN: is on or after 5 PM unless otherwise agreed to in writing as our cleaning staff needs sufficient time to prepare. Arriving onsite earlier without approval is trespassing 
- KEYS: to return any access keys and remotes with a $50 replacement fee for every lost key and $250 for any remote or entry FOB
- BUILDING STAFF/NEIGHBORS: you understand that building staff DO NOT work for us and will not assist you. Do not bother them. We typically host guests staying 30+ nights who tend to be familiar with the premises. If you happen to be an exception, do not share reservation details or engage in any activity that will disturb the tranquility of this residential community. Contact me or my team for ALL questions or directions. We pick-up phones until midnight and are eager to help you 
- QUIET HOURS/DISTURBANCE: between 9 PM and 9 AM. No parties, drug use, or gatherings of any kind. Any additional occupants in excess of the # on your reservation must be approved by me whether in your unit or in common areas. Any damage from you or your guests will result in immediate expulsion, at an additional cost to you, a claim with Airbnb and subsequent legal action 
- SMOKING: whether inside your unit, in a common area or roof deck, no smoking of any substance is allowed. Smoke damage to a unit will result in a $1000 fee
- PETS: you understand pets are not allowed in your unit. Pet damage may result in additional fees
- MISSING ITEMS: will be charged to you in a claim 
- ID CHECK: per the rules of this community, we'll request you submit your Government Issued Photo ID at the time of your e-check in via our site. You'll have to also agree to our terms of service. We're required to do a public records check for certain communities
- BREACH: any violation of the above shall result in immediate removal from the property at an additional cost to you
- BOOKING WITHIN 24 HRS: We'll send a request for a $500-1000 deposit which shall be fully returned on checkout

description:
Gorgeous 2BD/2BA Unit in the heart of Chicago - Magnificent Mile. Professionally managed and cleaned with stylish kitchen, free high-speed wifi and 24/7 support. Fully stocked with all the convenience you would expect at a hotel.

We are available to assist you with absolutely anything you need through midnight, 7 days a week

Located in one of Chicago's lakefront neighborhoods. This apartment is ideal for those who want to have the best of both worlds. City living at it's finest with the best dining and shopping places and just a few minutes away is Oak Street Beach which is a great place for water sports and biking. Enjoy its warm red brick exterior that highlights the rich history that this apartment is known for. Floor to ceiling windows provides the open concept living/dining room apartment a lot of natural light. All units are furnished and provided flat screen TV's, free fast wifi service, kitchenware/cookware and bathroom amenities. Our amazing customer support team are always available to attend to your needs.

We offer rewards and complimentary upgrades to our regular repeat guests
house_rules:
- You agree to the following:
- 
- CHECK-IN: is on or after 5 PM unless otherwise agreed to in writing as our cleaning staff needs sufficient time to prepare. Arriving onsite earlier without approval is trespassing 
- KEYS: to return any access keys and remotes with a $50 replacement fee for every lost key and $250 for any remote or entry FOB
- BUILDING STAFF/NEIGHBORS: you understand that building staff DO NOT work for us and will not assist you. Do not bother them. We typically host guests staying 30+ nights who tend to be familiar with the premises. If you happen to be an exception, do not share reservation details or engage in any activity that will disturb the tranquility of this residential community. Contact me or my team for ALL questions or directions. We pick-up phones until midnight and are eager to help you 
- QUIET HOURS/DISTURBANCE: between 9 PM and 9 AM. No parties, drug use, or gatherings of any kind. Any additional occupants in excess of the # on your reservation must be approved by me whether in your unit or in common areas. Any damage from you or your guests will result in immediate expulsion, at an additional cost to you, a claim with Airbnb and subsequent legal action 
- SMOKING: whether inside your unit, in a common area or roof deck, no smoking of any substance is allowed. Smoke damage to a unit will result in a $1000 fee
- PETS: you understand pets are not allowed in your unit. Pet damage may result in additional fees
- MISSING ITEMS: will be charged to you in a claim 
- ID CHECK: per the rules of this community, we'll request you submit your Government Issued Photo ID at the time of your e-check in via our site. You'll have to also agree to our terms of service. We're required to do a public records check for certain communities
- BREACH: any violation of the above shall result in immediate removal from the property at an additional cost to you
- BOOKING WITHIN 24 HRS: We'll send a request for a $500-1000 deposit which shall be fully returned on checkout
interaction: We are available to assist you with absolutely anything you need through midnight, 7 days a week

additional_house_rules:
1) Quiet hour is 10pm. We have children and neighbors so any noise complaints will result in a $50 charge.

2) We do not allow smoking inside. Breaking the rule will incur you a $250 fine

3) Check-in time is any time after 4pm. Check-out time is anytime before 11am. You are welcomed to request an early check-in or late check-out,  but this not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance.

4) Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed. 

5) if a location is left an exceptionally in a messy state, we will charge $40 per every hour of cleaning required.

6) Guest are not allowed to book a stay in the city of residence.   ( If you live in Chicago don't bother booking with us. )

7) Guest take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occur while on the property and its facilities.  By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guest are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. 
Guest recognize that they may personally purchase insurance  for such events. 

8) If more guests sleep at a location  than the number originally stated in the booking, the security will be charged in full. 

9) if you notice anything that presents a danger that could results in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know. 

10)  If guest delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined checkout time, guest will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11am and 12pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 12pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if we have approved your late checkout. 

11) When you make a reservation with us. you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.

description:
Wonderful, Modern and inviting,  3 bedroom, 2 bath unit located between Logan Square and Roscoe village.  Waking distance to the El Blue line. 15 minutes to Michigan ave Shops and Wrigley Field. This home is truly a great place to call home while exploring everything Chicago has to offer. 

You won't find a better location than this bright and comfortable vacation rental, which is perfectly maintained to accommodate your needs away from home.

The Condo is stocked ever everything you need, including cookware, a microwave, coffee maker, Kuerig, dishes and everything else that you may need.

We live in the building so we are always accessible. We will always respect your privacy. But if you ever need us we will be around.

If you like to shop Michigan Ave is 15 minutes away. We are also a mecca for food lovers. Michelin award winning Fat Rice as well as Top Chef Contestant and James Beard winner  Beverly Kims' Parachutes are walking distance to the unit. Grocery stores Marianos and Jewel are close. 
The unit is a short trip to all the bars, restaurants, Museums and activities that Chicago has to offer.

I have posted pictures to show how centered the unit is. We are located 1 minute away for the 90/94 highway. Belmont ave bus is located right outside and the blue line train station is a short 5 min walk. 
We also have a parking spot available with the rental.

additional_house_rules: - No smoking No pets No parties or events--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  PLEASE READ HOUSE RULES BEFORE MAKING AN INQUIRY OR RESERVATION  1. To maintain a safe and wonderful environment, inside the property there is a strict NO PARTYING, NO PETS, NO SMOKING/NO DRUGS policy (including vaping). Be respectful towards the neighbors and keep the noise down especially between 10 pm and 8 am.  2. If you like to bring over a friend let me know in advance, no surprise visitors. For safety and liability reasons UNREGISTERED GUESTS i.e. guests not listed in the reservation, are not allowed inside the property after 11 pm. Noncompliance may result in cancellation of your reservation and additional fees and penalties as UNREGISTERED GUESTS are a violation of Airbnb terms of service.  3. Please be respectful by KEEPING ALL SHARED AREAS CLEAN AND TIDY. Put things back the way you found them. The booked guests agree to reimburse and/or compensate the host, through their Airbnb security deposit, for any damages, extra cleaning, and/or losses caused at any time during their stay at the property.  We will want you to acknowledge that you have read the house rules by stating in your reservation and verbally once you are in the condo.  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- POR FAVOR, LEA LAS REGLAS DE LA CASA ANTES DE HACER UNA CONSULTA O RESERVA  1. Para mantener un ambiente seguro y agradable, dentro de la propiedad hay una estricta política de NO FIESTAS, NO MASCOTAS, NO FUMAR/NO DROGAS (incluyendo cigarrillos eléctricos). Sea respetuoso con los vecinos y reduzca el ruido especialmente entre las 10 pm y las 8 am.  2. Si deseas traer a un amigo, háznoslo saber con antelación, no invitados sorpresa. Por razones de seguridad y responsabilidad legal, después de las 11 pm. no están permitidos dentro de la propiedad HUÉSPEDES NO REGISTRADOS, es decir, huéspedes que no figuran en la reserva. El incumplimiento puede dar como resultado la cancelación de su reservación y cuotas y penalizaciones adicionales, ya que los huéspedes no registrados son una violación de los términos de servicio de Airbnb.  3. Sea respetuoso MANTENIENDO TODAS LAS AREAS COMUNES LIMPIAS Y ORDENADAS. Vuelva a poner las cosas como las encontró. Los huéspedes registrados acuerdan reembolsar y/o compensar al anfitrión, a través del depósito de seguridad de Airbnb, cualquier daño, limpieza extra y/o pérdidas ocasionadas en cualquier momento durante su estancia en la propiedad.  Te pediremos que confirmes que has leido estas reglas de nuestro hogar por medio de tu reservacion y de manera verbal cuando estes en la casa.   You must also acknowledge Security Deposit - if you damage the home, you may be charged up to $20000 Some spaces are shared - Kitchen, Living Room, Dining Room, Laundry Room, Outdoor Gym- No smoking No pets No parties or events Check-in time is 3PM - 6PM Check out by 11AM More information Para ESPAÑOL vea más abajo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

access: Guests will have access to all common areas, free wifi, and parking may be available upon request in a designated, covered garage for an additional charge ($15 per day).
description:
Private room with separate bathroom in Uptown/Lakeview! Guests in my home will have their own private bedroom with an adjacent bathroom with shower across the hall. This location grants you access to the best of both worlds: a quiet, tree-lined neighborhood just north of bustling Lakeview, Wrigley Field, Montrose Beach, and Lincoln Park and a quick and easy CTA commute via train or express bus to the downtown Chicago and many other popular areas in the city!

As a traveler myslef, I enjoy sharing my home with old and new friends visiting Chicago. The apartment has plenty of space bedrooms and two bathrooms. You will be sharing the common spaces, in a designated guest room with access to your own bathroom across the hall. It is a full sized bed, so more than comfortable for one traveler, but nice and cozy for two. A third floor walk-up, gives the the luxury of a beautiful, south-facing outdoor patio that grants the living space excellent light.

I love having guests and do so often, so I am looking to extend my home to other travelers as well. Please don't let the lack of reviews put you off. I have been so rewarded meeting great people as AirBnB guests over the years, so I've just joined AirBnb to share my home! If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask.

Guests will have access to all common areas, free wifi, and parking may be available upon request in a designated, covered garage for an additional charge ($15 per day).

I work in consulting and as a freelance musician. When I'm working from home, you will see me up and about the house tending to my patio garden or hovered over my laptop. Please feel free to chat or ask me anything about the city! Of course, if you prefer space, that is not an issue at all either.

You can pretty much walk or bike (divvy stalls near by) to the lake, and Wrigleyville, take public transportation to and from anywhere (downtown/ museums and such). Shared riders are always available for you to catch

This neighborhood is close to Wrigleyville, the lake, boys town while allowing you to come home to a quiet and relaxed area  for you to relax and recharge
house_rules: - No smoking No pets No parties or events--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  PLEASE READ HOUSE RULES BEFORE MAKING AN INQUIRY OR RESERVATION  1. To maintain a safe and wonderful environment, inside the property there is a strict NO PARTYING, NO PETS, NO SMOKING/NO DRUGS policy (including vaping). Be respectful towards the neighbors and keep the noise down especially between 10 pm and 8 am.  2. If you like to bring over a friend let me know in advance, no surprise visitors. For safety and liability reasons UNREGISTERED GUESTS i.e. guests not listed in the reservation, are not allowed inside the property after 11 pm. Noncompliance may result in cancellation of your reservation and additional fees and penalties as UNREGISTERED GUESTS are a violation of Airbnb terms of service.  3. Please be respectful by KEEPING ALL SHARED AREAS CLEAN AND TIDY. Put things back the way you found them. The booked guests agree to reimburse and/or compensate the host, through their Airbnb security deposit, for any damages, extra cleaning, and/or losses caused at any time during their stay at the property.  We will want you to acknowledge that you have read the house rules by stating in your reservation and verbally once you are in the condo.  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- POR FAVOR, LEA LAS REGLAS DE LA CASA ANTES DE HACER UNA CONSULTA O RESERVA  1. Para mantener un ambiente seguro y agradable, dentro de la propiedad hay una estricta política de NO FIESTAS, NO MASCOTAS, NO FUMAR/NO DROGAS (incluyendo cigarrillos eléctricos). Sea respetuoso con los vecinos y reduzca el ruido especialmente entre las 10 pm y las 8 am.  2. Si deseas traer a un amigo, háznoslo saber con antelación, no invitados sorpresa. Por razones de seguridad y responsabilidad legal, después de las 11 pm. no están permitidos dentro de la propiedad HUÉSPEDES NO REGISTRADOS, es decir, huéspedes que no figuran en la reserva. El incumplimiento puede dar como resultado la cancelación de su reservación y cuotas y penalizaciones adicionales, ya que los huéspedes no registrados son una violación de los términos de servicio de Airbnb.  3. Sea respetuoso MANTENIENDO TODAS LAS AREAS COMUNES LIMPIAS Y ORDENADAS. Vuelva a poner las cosas como las encontró. Los huéspedes registrados acuerdan reembolsar y/o compensar al anfitrión, a través del depósito de seguridad de Airbnb, cualquier daño, limpieza extra y/o pérdidas ocasionadas en cualquier momento durante su estancia en la propiedad.  Te pediremos que confirmes que has leido estas reglas de nuestro hogar por medio de tu reservacion y de manera verbal cuando estes en la casa.   You must also acknowledge Security Deposit - if you damage the home, you may be charged up to $20000 Some spaces are shared - Kitchen, Living Room, Dining Room, Laundry Room, Outdoor Gym- No smoking No pets No parties or events Check-in time is 3PM - 6PM Check out by 11AM More information Para ESPAÑOL vea más abajo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

description:
A perfect sized guest bedroom in a beautiful home in the best neighborhood in Chicago. 

Be close to all of the action in Chicago’s Lakeview neighborhood! You will be walking distance to Lake Michigan, Wrigleyville, Boystown, Belmont Theater District, Addison Station, Belmont Station, and much more.  Nightlife, retail shopping, coffee shops, and liquor stores all walking distance.

Great for people eager to visit one of the most diverse, cultured, and popular late-night neighborhoods in Chicago.

You will love my home because of the A+ location, amenities, and accessibility with a bus Stop right outside of the front door, Divvy Bike station directly across the street, and Belmont or Addison Red Line stops within 10 minutes walking distance. 

Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and groups (I have other rooms available per request)

This 2nd floor property is beautifully located in the heart of Boystown’s historic nightlife. This property is perfect for entertaining because of its open layout. You will also have access to the bar (provide your own booze), board games, and beer pong. (During summer months) guests will also have access to the back porch.

During your visit you will have access to Internet, in-unit Washer/Dryer, and reserved easy in & out driveway parking available for purchase so you don’t have to worry about checking on your car throughout your visit.

You will love this beautiful private space that is designed to make guests feel at home with an emphasis on community and occupation of common spaces. 

Central Air Conditioning and Heat
In-unit Washer/Dryer
Dining space for at the table and at the bar stool. 

2 Bathrooms, WiFi, TV (bring your own programming), 1 Bluetooth speaker in the common area, Towels and Linens, Coffee, Equipped Kitchen, Blow dryers, Let me know if there is anything specific you may need before or during your trip and I will do my best to accommodate! 

Wrigley Field = 9 minute walk
Addison Station = 9 minute walk
Boystown Bars = Seconds away
Belmont Station = 10 minute walk
Belmont Harbor = 16 minute walk

Magnificent Mile = 11+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
Soldier Field = 15+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
DePaul University Lincoln Park = 10 minute car ride (35 minute walk)
Aragon Ballroom = 10 minute car ride
Lincoln Park Zoo = 10 minute car ride (35 minute walk)
Millennium Park = 14+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
United Center = 23+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
Field Museum & Shedd Aquarium = 19+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)

Once your booking is confirmed you will receive check in instructions before arrival in your itinerary.

Nearby lockboxes with keys allow convenient check-in.
In & out driveway access for guests who purchase parking.

Close to Boystown, Wrigleyville, Lakeview, Belmont Harbor, Wrigley Field, Belmont and Addison L stations, Lakefront, Lake Michigan, Lincoln Park, SouthPort, and Andersonville. 

Located In a lively entertainment district that is surrounded by restaurants and bars. Bars close at 2:00am and 3:00 am Saturdays. 

Spacious apartment with great views and a great location.

Great place for Cub’s games, Pride, Market Days, Lollapalooza, St. Patrick's, and Chicago Marathon. You will literally be able to watch the pride parade, pride festival, and Market Days festival from the living room.

CTA Bus stop is outside of the front door.
Addison Station = 9 minute walk
Belmont Station = 10 minute walk
Divvy Bike station directly across the street.
Belmont Harbor = 16 minute walk

Parking can be purchased (onsite and offsite)

Please inquire about any questions regarding minimum and maximum length bookings, I am open to working on durations!

access: Mostly just the apartment, but there is a backyard for people who want to smoke.
description:
Giant, 5 bedroom, 2,300 square feet apartment near Red Line Train, bars, cafe's, shopping, restaurants, Lakefront and everything else Chicago has to offer.  Large living room with bar area, TV and fridge for socializing before hitting the town.

Dining room off the kitchen has a large table and 8 chairs.

5 bedrooms with 2 private rooms with king beds and one with a double bed.

3 futons for in the living room for extra sleeping space

2 car garage

Built in 1893, solid gray-stone mansion.  The unit has 5 bedrooms, 2 full baths, kitchen and large living room with plenty of seating, a bar, TV, fridge and cool decorations.

Mostly just the apartment, but there is a backyard for people who want to smoke.

I'm available if you need something, otherwise; you're on your own.

Quiet neighborhood walking distance to busy Broadway restaurants, clubs and shops.  10 blocks walk or 1 stop on the Red Line train to Wrigley Field and the tons of cool bars and nightlife there.  Walking distance to Belmont Harbor at Lake Michigan which has a running path, golf course, bird sanctuary and beach.

The Red, Brown and Purple Line Train station is about 5 blocks away; an easy walk.  There are buses on Broadway and Belmont streets which is 1 block away.  Lakeshore Drive is 3 blocks away.  You don't need a car to get around here.

There are neighbors who live in the apartment below.  This means you'll need to be considerate of noise late at night or early morning.  Please be respectful of them.
interaction: I'm available if you need something, otherwise; you're on your own.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood walking distance to busy Broadway restaurants, clubs and shops.  10 blocks walk or 1 stop on the Red Line train to Wrigley Field and the tons of cool bars and nightlife there.  Walking distance to Belmont Harbor at Lake Michigan which has a running path, golf course, bird sanctuary and beach.
notes: There are neighbors who live in the apartment below.  This means you'll need to be considerate of noise late at night or early morning.  Please be respectful of them.
space: Built in 1893, solid gray-stone mansion.  The unit has 5 bedrooms, 2 full baths, kitchen and large living room with plenty of seating, a bar, TV, fridge and cool decorations.
summary:
Giant, 5 bedroom, 2,300 square feet apartment near Red Line Train, bars, cafe's, shopping, restaurants, Lakefront and everything else Chicago has to offer.  Large living room with bar area, TV and fridge for socializing before hitting the town.

Dining room off the kitchen has a large table and 8 chairs.

5 bedrooms with 2 private rooms with king beds and one with a double bed.

3 futons for in the living room for extra sleeping space

2 car garage
transit: The Red, Brown and Purple Line Train station is about 5 blocks away; an easy walk.  There are buses on Broadway and Belmont streets which is 1 block away.  Lakeshore Drive is 3 blocks away.  You don't need a car to get around here.

access: Bedroom, bathroom, living room, kitchen and porch. Regarding multiple guests: available for use are a full size bed, pull out air mattress in the bedroom, chaise in the adjoining living room and extra air mattress for use in living room. The this room is a common area we allow as much privacy as possible for guests.
description:
Gorgeous apartment with porch and hardwood floors geared towards artists, professionals, parents and students visiting campus. We are a peaceful, mother daughter household. The location is ideally centered right in the heart of downtown Evanston, a block away from the library, Whole Foods, the beach, close to many coffee shops, parks, restaurants, a movie theater, public transit and book stores. Late kitchen with table and large screen TV in the living room are available for use with HDML cable.

The room is not entirely private in that the wall to living room is half, with a thick curtain. This makes it visually private but not soundproof. It’s not the best choice for being raucous or requiring a completely soundproof space. However, we stay in the back of the apartment so you can stay up and talk as you wish and maintain your privacy. Open curtain allows a lovely view of the porch/outdoors, along with full living room access. It’s Very bright and airy, though the bedroom can be made pitch park with the curtain. 
The main lock is tricky. No need to mention it in reviews, please. You must put the key in all the way, pull it out slightly and turn to the right. 
We are handicapped accessible with no steps or stairs, and offer a bath grip bar.

Bedroom, bathroom, living room, kitchen and porch. Regarding multiple guests: available for use are a full size bed, pull out air mattress in the bedroom, chaise in the adjoining living room and extra air mattress for use in living room. The this room is a common area we allow as much privacy as possible for guests.

I don’t like to interact much, my mother is more social. I’m here for questions when I’m home. My phone number is (786) 972-9228. Please text me or call any time day or night with questions!!

Whole Foods, cvs, TJ, Jewel, coffee shops, many restaurants, transit, movie theater, one block from the lake. The Train stop nearby is Davis, the purple line.

Street or garage parking. Metra and CTA within blocks. Buses nearby. Bike rentals and a comprehensive bike path system.

NO SMOKING AT ALL during the stay. No drugs/partying but don’t worry about voices carrying, no set quiet hours. Shoeless preferred, slippers are provided. Guests are allowed with permission. Cooking is allowed. 
The main lock is tricky. You must put the key in all the way, pull it out slightly and turn to the right. 
Very important to keep the patio screen door shut for the cat!!! Thank you!!

access: You will have access to the entire lower floor. You will have your own private entrance in the back of the building. Check-in instructions will include how to access back door. The hosts live directly upstairs and can be contacted via phone, email, or through Airbnb.
description:
Unwind and enjoy the city in our Cozy and Clean Guest Suite! 

We're new hosts on Airbnb and super excited to begin having guests stay at our recently furnished guest space. 

We live in the main, separable part of the property and are excited for you to use our space as a home base for which to decompress or explore the city!

You can expect 2 bedrooms with Queen sized beds, a full bathroom, and a living area complete with kitchenette, sofa bed, and desk.

You will have access to the entire lower floor. You will have your own private entrance in the back of the building. Check-in instructions will include how to access back door. The hosts live directly upstairs and can be contacted via phone, email, or through Airbnb.

We are happily available to assist with any questions or concerns via text/phone or email.

We are in the heart of Logan Square and are within walking distance of many great restaurants, bars, breweries, and shops. We are within a 3 minute walk from the California Blue Line stop which can take you directly downtown. The O’Hare airport is accessible by taking the Blue Line and is less than a 30 minute ride from the California stop.

We recommend using public transportation to get to and from our place. The Blue Line is only a 3 minute walk and is an excellent choice for getting into the heart of the city or the airport. There is street parking available; however, it is not always guaranteed. If you do drive and have difficulty finding a parking spot, there is a SpotHero location directly across the street. (Just download their app and put in our address to locate it).

description:
Super location one bedroom apartment located in the heart of downtown Chicago with open view . Walking distance to L train station ,Union Station ,Millennium Park , Michigan avenue ,Willis Tower and Chicago River.

Apartment is in a luxury high-rise building in Chicago's West Loop neighborhood.

The space has Full size sofa section. Dining table set ,  Fast WiFi ,55” Smart TV with Local Channel
Blue-ray player included

Kitchen Amenities with coffee machine and necessary dishware. Laundry in the building.

24 hours on call.

The West Loop is one of the most happening neighborhoods in Chicago. It's home to some of the city's best restaurants, amazing shops and a bar scene that's hard to beat. It's also incredibly easy to get to—the Blue, Pink and Green lines all run through it, and one of several buses can get you there in a jiff. There's no doubt the West Loop is far and away the best Loop

The location couldn't be better for visitors, as you can walk to a lot of attractions and sites. Public transportation is extremely convenient, and you definitely don't need a car to get around. It's close to Union Station,all CTA lines and numerous bus stations

Check out time is 11:00 AM.

Please leave key in unit when check-out and send notice.

Please shoes off and trash in bags .

In building Parking $40 per 24 hours

Outside parking lot$30 per 24 hours
interaction: 24 hours on call.

access: Guests have access to the building's seasonal pool and fitness center.
description:
Experience can't-miss city views in this 3 bedroom/3 bath penthouse steps from Michigan Ave. This space comes with modern amenities such as a heated outdoor pool and fitness center. Here you’ll find all the comforts of home: full kitchen, custom artwork, and furnishings curated to reflect the beauty of the Windy City.

This space captures the essence of style and comfort, which is what Domio is all about. This 3 bedroom and 3 bath penthouse boasts a stylish living room, hand-picked furniture, and premium finishes. In addition to a fully stocked kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, guests will be pleased to find personalized decor and artwork throughout the home. This Domio has a queen bed in each bedroom and an air mattress in the living room.

Bedroom 1:
Queen Bed

Bedroom 2:
Queen Bed

Bedroom 3:
Queen Bed

Loft:
Queen Bed

Living Room: 
Sofa Bed
Air Mattress

Guests have access to the building's seasonal pool and fitness center.

We do our best to tailor each experience to our guests preferences. Want advice, suggestions, or a shoulder to lean on? We are always available at your disposal. Need a place to stay but don't feel like chatting? That's okay too, we won't be offended.

River North is one of Chicago's most premier neighborhoods and this Domio is in the middle of it all. Magnificent Mile is a 3 minute walk for anyone looking to do shopping. Additionally, Oak Street Beach and Lake Michigan are only a 12 minute walk away. There are also many restaurants and cafes in the walkable neighborhood.

Chicago Registration Number: R19000043208

One of the bedrooms is accessible via stairs only.

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago and surrounding areas.

description:
Newly rehabbed apartment. Modern looking 2 bed, 1 bath 1100sq ft. Plenty of non permitted street parking. Secured building with plenty of street lights. Ground floor apartment so you can expect a bit noise from top floor. 

Guests are welcome to use the kitchen and living room. I will be here residing with my guest and love meeting them and getting to know them. I also enjoy telling them about the city.

CLOSE TO DOWNTOWN, HydePark, Lakeshore Drive, UOfC, 
1 min walk to bus stop.

Granite kitchen counters
Completely renovated apt with a modern feel at evert corner
More pics of the apartment to be uploaded
Nest Thermostat
Humidifier in the apartment for convenience
Your room has a large window for natural lights.
Parking usually found in front of the apartment. Apartment is clean and you can always expect it to be clean

- Living Room
- Kitchen
- Hallway

I am always available through text or call. I am here to make sure your experience in this city is a memorable one.
Looking forward to hosting future guest :)

Safe and secured

Plenty of street lights
Park right across or catch the local bus top a few steps away from the apartment

access: When the whole condo is rented, guests have full access to the space. There are 3 bedrooms in total, but only 2 are open to guests. The 3rd bedroom is my personal one, so it remains locked during full house rentals.
description:
Newly built 2bed/1bath condo 2 miles from downtown Chicago. Perfect for a group of friends going to a festival, or a large family. Flexible on the # of guest we can accommodate; please feel free to ask host if you have a larger group. Located in a quiet neighborhood to relax as if you were at home, but still be close to the city for all it has to offer. Walking distance to dozens of restaurants in Taylor Street &Little Italy.

Modern, neat and minimalistic 3 bed/2 bath condo. (Only 2 rooms open to guests)
1st floor unit; 2 entrances (front and back doors). No steps to get in.
Dinning table may be used as a desk/working area.
Full kitchen available, shared refrigerator, and we provide paper plates and plastic cups if needed. You may help yourself to some coffee for breakfast. The kitchen & dinning room are big enough for meal prep, cooking & eating for about 6 people.
Living room has 2 large couches and can accommodate up to 6-8 people for movie night ;) 
1 shared bathroom for 2 rooms. Additional towels and bathroom supplies available. Complimentary toiletries can be found in top shelf. 

* Free street parking available.

** The whole condo is wheelchair accessible, and guest bathroom has grab bars for toilet and shower. Shower chair available upon request.

When the whole condo is rented, guests have full access to the space. There are 3 bedrooms in total, but only 2 are open to guests. The 3rd bedroom is my personal one, so it remains locked during full house rentals.

I'm a very laid back host in my 30's that knows 'almost' everything about the city and can provide direction as needed :)  I'm able to help anytime and you can reach me out via the Airbnb app or text message; I'm pretty fast responding.

Enjoy food & street festivals, free concerts in Grand Park, Museums, Broadway shows, restaurants, and music festivals that happen every week in Spring, Summer & Fall! :)
2 miles from downtown Chicago. Approx $4-7 Uber ride (7-10 min drive) / or 20 min biking.
Located in University Village / Little Italy neighborhood, calm & quiet. Mostly students and young adults.  2 blocks away from UIC.
Near IL Medical District. RUSH hospital & University a few minutes away. 
Walkable distance to Taylor street (tons of bars and restaurants)
Literally across the street of St. Ignatius College Prep and Church

2 miles west from downtown Chicago
Uber to downtown approx $4-7
Public transit: Bus stop 1 block away -> Roosevelt & Blue Island. 
A lot of buses go straight to the city every few minutes

Free street parking available. The only restriction is during Street Cleaning days; please check signs in trees
house_rules: Parties and events allowed if full house is rented.

additional_house_rules:
General Rules
-Please treat the home as if it is your own.
-Please respect our guest limit capacity of 4 people.
-Do not engage in illegal activities anywhere on the property.
-If you accidentally damage anything during your stay, please contact the host for your safety and the future safety of the next guest.
-We pride ourselves on being green and would appreciate you turning off the TV and lights when you check-out.
-Please remember to sign out of any ROKU apps you utilized via your personal accounts before departing.

Quiet Hours
Quiet hours are between 10p-8a.
This is a residential building and ask that for the respect of permanent tenants basic courtesies of being mindful of your noise levels and not congregating in hallways outside of the unit be observed.

Please be advised that this home is equipped with NoiseAware. NoiseAware works like a smoke detector, but for noise. The sensor tracks the decibel levels in this home, evaluates other risk factors and will send an alert if there are excess noise levels detected. Please do not unplug the device.

Receiving a noise complaint from the building or the device can result in the forfeiture of your stay and a $1000 fine. 

No Smoking
The home (and entire building including outdoor common areas) is designated as a strictly smoke-free community. There will be a $500 fee imposed if you choose to smoke in the building. Please respect our policy and step outside the vicinity.

Key Fob
The key fob is your way of accessing everything from your short-stay apartment to the amenity spaces in the building. If you happen to lose your key fob, you will be charged $75. 

Pets 
There are no pets allowed in the unit or building. There will be a $250 fee imposed if you choose to bring a pet into the building.

Security
Please be advised that the building exterior and common spaces are equipped with surveillance devices. Please respect the building and its community. 

Emergencies
Contact your host immediately with any issues. An emergency maintenance number is provided in the home guide for any building issues that involve water or hazards in the home.

For medical, fire and police related emergencies please call 911.

access: The entire home is yours to enjoy for the duration of your stay. You will also have access to all of the building's beautiful and unique amenities.
description:
Welcome to GEHRY GLITZ, a beautiful one bedroom with luxury amenities. Lounge on the roof top and take in the skyline views or sweat it out namaste style in the yoga room . The rooftop includes Insta-worthy views, fire pits for rosé days, and plenty of space to host your friends. This urban enclave is built for you!

Sleeping Arrangements
Master Bedroom - 1 Queen Bed
Living Room - Pull Out Sleeper Sofa (Queen)

Kitchen  
The kitchen is fully equipped with pots, pants, utensils, silverware, plates, bowls, cups, knives, a cutting board, salt and pepper, a coffee maker, and cream and sugar – for however you take it.  
 
Cleaning Supplies  
You’re supplied with dish soap, a sponge, dish detergent and paper towels.

Washer/Dryer 
There is a washer/dryer in unit. We provide you with detergent for your stay!

TV
The Roku guide is posted next to the TV. There is also a digital antenna for local channels. Please remember to sign out of any of any Roku apps you’ve utilize during your stay. 

Non-Smoking 
The home and entire building is designated as a smoke-free community. There will be a $500 fee imposed if you choose to smoke in unit or the building. Please respect our policy and step outside.

Deck
Enjoy access to the spacious roof-top lounge & deck complete with seating area, grills, and views of the skyline!

Parking
There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby.

Noise 
Potential for noise - You can hear the train and other city noises from the unit.

The entire home is yours to enjoy for the duration of your stay. You will also have access to all of the building's beautiful and unique amenities.

We are off-site but available when needed. The best way to reach us is by emailing reservations@livly.io!  In case of maintenance emergency, the in-unit home guide will detail phone numbers of who to call immediately.

The Loop is the official downtown area of Chicago! This area is buzzing with a lively atmosphere, stunning architecture and many of Chicago's famous landmarks.

The area features some of Chicago’s cultural attractions such as the Chicago Cultural Center, Art Institute of Chicago and Theatre District! There is also no shortage of award-winning restaurants and shopping in the area.

Let’s not forget the incredible outdoor spaces that the Loop has to offer! The “Bean” is located in the famed Millennium Park, the perfect place to relax during a Chicago summer day. There are also the newly added Chicago Riverwalk and Maggie Daley Park!

There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby.

The home is a 2 minute walk from the CTA brown, red, purple & pink line trains at the "LaSalle/Van Buren" stop. This train line will take you all over the city, including into the neighborhoods further north and south for exploring or transfer to another train line.

Check In / Check Out
Check in starts at 4 PM CT
Check out time is 11 AM CT

We do not offer early Check In or late Check Out. 

Luggage Hold 
If your travel arrangements have you arriving earlier or leaving later than our designated check in / check out times, we recommend using Wait Here Chicago. We have a partnership with them and can offer you discounted rates on their luggage hold options throughout the city.

description:
Great location for family fun, and business travelers.

*Great Location!  1 block to the Navy Pier, 2 blocks to the Magnificent Mile.  15 min walk to Millennium Park.   Most of the downtown restaurants are in this area. 

*This unit has stunning views of the city.  The views are truly marvelous.

*Full size kitchen and in unit washer/dryer, wood floors, granite countertops, and floor to ceiling windows.

*There are 3 king size beds, and 2 full bathrooms in the unit.

*3 grocery stores within 1 block.

Extra services are available for a small fee (like parking, early check in/late check out, extra bedding, additional traditional twin size bed, pack n play/ high chair).

- 24/7 Quiet Hours, please no parties
-Please be respectful of residents & building staff

additional_house_rules:
I'm a very easy going host. Most guests  are awesome like you, the following helps for the few bad actors

-  locals must contact the host prior to instant booking. This is to prevent parties at our building.

-If a party is thrown, and or more than your reserved guests are present, law enforcement will be called and you will be asked to exit the premises with no refund in addition to the fees listed below.

-You will be held financially responsible for any damage to the property as well as the resulting loss of hosting revenue  because  of said damage

- The building has a strict occupancy limit, any group attempting to violate the community policies on occupancy limit or quiet hours will be removed immediately.  Quiet hours are after 10pm. All guests staying with you must have been accounted for in your reservation. Additional guests without prior written permission is prohibited and subject to the fee of $150 per each unauthorized guests per night.


-There is a fee schedule for house rules violations, they are as follows: Checkout is 11AM. Unauthorized late check out is  $100 fee. If not vacating on time leads to other losses, you will be billed for that also. For example, if your late check-out causes me having to refund or relocate the incoming guests, you will be charged that amount in addition to the stated fees.  If unauthorized late check-out exceeds two hours, there is an additional $200 fee

This is a non-smoking building. Any type of smoke inside the apartment is prohibited. This violation will incure a $200 per day fee. 

Any lost garage opener will be $35 per  to replace. 

Our cleaning fee is based on a "Courteous guest" If you trash the apartment you will be billed an additional $75 fee. 

This is a self check-in property. You will be using a keypad doorknob with a given combination to enter the apartment. You understand this. You certify that you will read the check in instructions prior to arrival

access:
The complete apartment as well as the garden, and the garage rooftop. 
Relax on the bistro inspired string lighted patio with your friends and family. 

Note that since the apartment above is also an Airbnb, there may be other guests enjoying the outdoor amenities also
description:
Big spacious home that comfortably accommodates large groups and families

Bohemian inspired decor with intricate design details and vintage furnishings. Packed with real plants and earth tone colors, this beautiful home exudes comfort and warmth

-No parties whatsoever, please read the rules

Bohemian chic decor,  clean, and very spacious. With two floors it's perfect for large stays with friends to check out the vibrant city and it's abundant festivals and theaters.

In the building there are two apartments, your stay is on the first apartment. The apartment above you is also an Airbnb so you may hear walking/talking from above as well as standard creaks of a 100 year old building. Partying is not permitted in either apartment.


*Keypad entry allows you to check in at your leisure

*3 bedrooms, Master bedroom has a cali king bed, other two bedrooms have Queens. In addition there is sleep longue area  that is curtained off with up to three additional beds depending on your need

*Full kitchen with cookware and utensils, coffee, tea.

*Fenced in backyard patio with string lights and restaurant quality outdoor furniture (may be shared with guests from apartment above)

*Garage roofdeck with grill and hammock chair (weather depending)

* Garage parking for one car, but there's also ample free  parking.

*TV's with with Hulu, Netflix, Hbo, and Prime video all included.

*Voice controlled Alexa speakers

*central ac/heat that you control

*Bathroom fully stocked will all essentialls including hair dryer, makeup remover wipes, vanity kit etc.

*Convenient bus stop infront of the apartment that takes you into downtown. City bike rental dock one block away.

*My personal bartender's guide to the city. I use my connections as a member of the Chicago service industry to make sure you are taken care of well when you go out to dine and drink

The complete apartment as well as the garden, and the garage rooftop. 
Relax on the bistro inspired string lighted patio with your friends and family. 

Note that since the apartment above is also an Airbnb, there may be other guests enjoying the outdoor amenities also

You may contact me whenever you'd like, you're also more than welcome to visit me at the bar I work for a drink

The apartment is in the Humboldt park neighborhood, right next to a gorgeous city park that is also called Humboldt. It's a great place to spend some time relaxing as the park contains a boathouse, lagoons, gardens, fieldhouse etc. You can rent paddle boats, go fishing and more. There's a very popular trail nearby called the 606 that is great for a leisure stroll

The neighborhood is rich in culture and the cuisine is excellent. It  neighbors the very popular Logan square and wicker Park neighborhood for dining and nightlife  You will be a short ride from all the action. Getting into downtown could not be easier as there is a bus right infront  of the apartment that takes you right into downtown, magnificent mile, and the ever popular Navy Pier

Public transportation:
To get to downtown (magnificent mile) take the 70 bus that is infront of the apartment going east. To get to Navy Pier take the 65 grand bus.

Ride-sharing: an Uber /Lyft to downtown is typically 12-15 dollars and takes 20-30 mins

There is also a rent a bike docking station right infront of the apartment, $3 for  a 30 minute ride, or $15 for the day

Space can be rented for photoshoots and dinners.

Once again please do not smoke inside, use the patio and rooftop for your  smoking needs. Do not discard cigarettes on the ground.

Please use the beautiful park nearby for your pets bathroom time. 

And absolutely no partying or excessive noise
house_rules:
I'm a very easy going host. Most guests  are awesome like you, the following helps for the few bad actors

-  locals must contact the host prior to instant booking. This is to prevent parties at our building.

-If a party is thrown, and or more than your reserved guests are present, law enforcement will be called and you will be asked to exit the premises with no refund in addition to the fees listed below.

-You will be held financially responsible for any damage to the property as well as the resulting loss of hosting revenue  because  of said damage

- The building has a strict occupancy limit, any group attempting to violate the community policies on occupancy limit or quiet hours will be removed immediately.  Quiet hours are after 10pm. All guests staying with you must have been accounted for in your reservation. Additional guests without prior written permission is prohibited and subject to the fee of $150 per each unauthorized guests per night.


-There is a fee schedule for house rules violations, they are as follows: Checkout is 11AM. Unauthorized late check out is  $100 fee. If not vacating on time leads to other losses, you will be billed for that also. For example, if your late check-out causes me having to refund or relocate the incoming guests, you will be charged that amount in addition to the stated fees.  If unauthorized late check-out exceeds two hours, there is an additional $200 fee

This is a non-smoking building. Any type of smoke inside the apartment is prohibited. This violation will incure a $200 per day fee. 

Any lost garage opener will be $35 per  to replace. 

Our cleaning fee is based on a "Courteous guest" If you trash the apartment you will be billed an additional $75 fee. 

This is a self check-in property. You will be using a keypad doorknob with a given combination to enter the apartment. You understand this. You certify that you will read the check in instructions prior to arrival
interaction: You may contact me whenever you'd like, you're also more than welcome to visit me at the bar I work for a drink

space:
Bohemian chic decor,  clean, and very spacious. With two floors it's perfect for large stays with friends to check out the vibrant city and it's abundant festivals and theaters.

In the building there are two apartments, your stay is on the first apartment. The apartment above you is also an Airbnb so you may hear walking/talking from above as well as standard creaks of a 100 year old building. Partying is not permitted in either apartment.


*Keypad entry allows you to check in at your leisure

*3 bedrooms, Master bedroom has a cali king bed, other two bedrooms have Queens. In addition there is sleep longue area  that is curtained off with up to three additional beds depending on your need

*Full kitchen with cookware and utensils, coffee, tea.

*Fenced in backyard patio with string lights and restaurant quality outdoor furniture (may be shared with guests from apartment above)

*Garage roofdeck with grill and hammock chair (weather depending)

* Garage parking for one car, but there's also ample free  parking.

*TV's with with Hulu, Netflix, Hbo, and Prime video all included.

*Voice controlled Alexa speakers

*central ac/heat that you control

*Bathroom fully stocked will all essentialls including hair dryer, makeup remover wipes, vanity kit etc.

*Convenient bus stop infront of the apartment that takes you into downtown. City bike rental dock one block away.

*My personal bartender's guide to the city. I use my connections as a member of the Chicago service industry to make sure you are taken care of well when you go out to dine and drink
summary:
Big spacious home that comfortably accommodates large groups and families

Bohemian inspired decor with intricate design details and vintage furnishings. Packed with real plants and earth tone colors, this beautiful home exudes comfort and warmth

-No parties whatsoever, please read the rules
transit:
Public transportation:
To get to downtown (magnificent mile) take the 70 bus that is infront of the apartment going east. To get to Navy Pier take the 65 grand bus.

Ride-sharing: an Uber /Lyft to downtown is typically 12-15 dollars and takes 20-30 mins

There is also a rent a bike docking station right infront of the apartment, $3 for  a 30 minute ride, or $15 for the day

description:
Upgrade your Chicago experience and stay in this modern Domio apartment. Walking distance from some of Chicago's best attractions, this stylish space was professionally designed to delight our guest at every corner. There are also restaurants and bars just about 10 min walk. Whether traveling solo, with friends, or with family, see the best of history, architecture, and bites that Chicago has to offer.

This space exemplifies the Domio standard: uncompromising style and maximum comfort. This 2 bedroom and 2 bath home boasts a premium living room, premium furniture, and bright finishes. In addition to a fully stocked kitchen with professional-grade appliances, guests will be pleased to find hand-picked decor and artwork throughout the home. This Domio has the following bedroom layout:

Bedroom 1:
Queen Bed

Bedroom 2:
Queen Bed

Living Room:
Sofa Bed 
Air Mattress

Additionally, there is a washer/dryer in-unit.

access:
You'll have full, private access to the bedroom and living area, which is set up with a TV for you to login to your own streaming accounts. 

**Pullout couch coming this fall which can accommodate 2 more!
description:
***Brand new to Airbnb***

Modern and light, this unit was designed with comfort in mind. Large rooms make it an ideal place for travelers to stay. Nested in the beloved Lincoln Park neighborhood, just a few blocks from the DePaul University's Welcome Center, you'll be surrounded by lovely shops and restaurants on tree lined streets. Walk to Sweet Mandy B's, Summer House Santa Monica, fabulous Armitage shops and more! Very close to Armitage Brown Line Stop!

The space is appointed with a wet bar area, mini fridge, microwave and plenty of counter space. It's a newly remodeled apartment with a modern, clean bathroom and spacious living area.

In mid-September, a luxurious pull-out couch will be added to the living room.  In the meantime, an air mattress can be made available for groups larger than 2 people.

You'll have full, private access to the bedroom and living area, which is set up with a TV for you to login to your own streaming accounts. 

**Pullout couch coming this fall which can accommodate 2 more!

The apartment is within a half mile of multi subway stops and the Clybourne Metra station making it easy to get to and travel around the city a cinch once you're here. 

We also happily welcome travelers coming via car.  A Chicago novelty, there is free parking on the street that is actually easy find!
house_rules: Quiet Hours start at 10pm until 8am. No Smoking. Smoking inside will incur a minimum charge of $250.00.

description:
Welcome to Chicago!

Our trendy unit is perfect for both business and leisure travelers. 

We are conveniently located between Ohare & downtown in the safe Jefferson Park neighborhood. We are a short distance to the Jefferson Park Transit Center as well as highways.
house_rules:
-There is a strict no smoking policy inside of the unit. If smoke is smelled in the building you will be asked to leave and there will be a $500 cleaning fine. 

- We have a rule against noise, music, and/or partying after 10pm. 

- Neighbors have and will call the police for guests who do any illegal activities including smoking marijuana on the premise.
summary:
Welcome to Chicago!

Our trendy unit is perfect for both business and leisure travelers. 

We are conveniently located between Ohare & downtown in the safe Jefferson Park neighborhood. We are a short distance to the Jefferson Park Transit Center as well as highways.
